name: Stay Warm
description:
DISCLAIMER: Proto-type game for educational purposes.

Space to fire, wasd/arrow keys for movement, E to spawn turret.

Ice is covering the world, and the Frozen Legion is on a quest to extinguish all the flame and heat in the world. Stand against the un-ending frozen blight headed your way; or feel the cold grasp of death.

This is basically a line-defense game, but the lines are not clearly distinguised. Enemies will keep spawning from the right-side of the screen and head to the left. Stop them; for if they get past, you will lose life until you die and need to restart.

You can spawn camp fires which shoot straight in front of them. These will slow down their rate of fire as time passes; but you can refresh and empower their speed by shooting at them; or have another camp fires fire at it. Currently camp fires have no cost, and no collision; so you can stack them. In a potential future version of this, it will cost heat (your score) to build these camp fires.

Things to include before it can be more than a proto-type:

- Change the code to not be so reliant on 60FPS to function properly

- Add in sounds and music

- Main menu and score screen

A short test game for educational purposes of the creator. It includes basic movement, raycasting, prefabs, fps-based updating code. Run at 60-FPS.
